Evocation 8

Astral Tempest
Combat
S5
spell id [id]: 581
effect number [effect_number]: 81
damage [damage]: 3
spec [spec]: 8388608
casting time [casttime]: 225%
area of effect [aoe_s]: Caster
number of effects [nreff]: 1
fatigue cost [fatiguecost]: 200-
gems required [gemcost]: 2S
Enchant Battlefield | Enchant World:Astral Tempest
 
(May Use Underwater [uwok])
The caster unleashes an astral storm upon the battlefield. The storm is physically undetectable, but every unit that is not mindless takes damage as the storm rips the very souls from their bodies. Spellcasting is extra difficult during the astral tempest and all non mindless magic users will have trouble casting spells unless they have very high magic resistance.
Continously targets the battle field with 1 AN dmg (MR negates)
